publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1498 Des McNulty on behalf of the Finance Committee: 5th Report (Session 2) of the Finance Committee, Stage 1 of the 2005-06 Budget Process-That the Parliament notes the 5th Report, 2004 (Session 2) of the Finance Committee, Stage 1 of the 2005-06 Budget Process (SP Paper 182) and refers the recommendations to the Scottish Executive for consideration.
